channel.title: How To Add NCPS/Items Into My Server
channel.description:
HELP!! how do i add items and NCPS into my server.
when i use the codes they apper to me but dont apper to anyone eles even if i compile.
Any Tips?

item.title: How To Add NCPS/Items Into My Server
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

I was not thinking right then. 1 mistake in a cfg file because im trying to post on rl also is not a “giant” mistake.

bluurr:

knowing where to add a few number to a cfg file is called programing now?

Now people consider it programming because its “hard” for them

[quote=“Benz, post:7, topic:198584”][quote author=warlok link=topic=263252.msg2178909#msg2178909 date=1207928334]
Proof you cannot code!!! ok now back to the point, Npc.cfg
[/quote]
Lol @ npc.cfg - he can’t code? Look at you, you don’t even know where to add NPCs.[/quote]

i was also thinking about the “adding an npc” where you add the hp and all.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Add NCPS/Items Into My Server

item.title: How To Add NCPS/Items Into My Server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

To add Npcs you have to go to your autospawn.cfg and manually add them

To add items to your server go to your item.cfg and add them from there.

I suggest you observe the other npcs and items when ur in the autospawn and item.cfg cuz i wont explain now cuz i g2g to school.

Read full topic
